thread.section_title: Starfire Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Starfire Direct | starfiredirect.com
thread.title: Robby

author: Robby
title: Robby
text: I have had to deal with customer service multiple times and they have always worked quickly to resolve my issues. I have purchased for new projects and also ordered replacement parts for old projects and every representative I have worked with has always been very knowledgable about what I need. John Mera has been excellent in helping with my returns and always quickly connected me to a sales associate for proper replacements/substitutions. I have also been very happy with the materials we have received as they look great and function very well.
